column1: Smoque BBQ////OK I think the "que" had me thinking this was going to be a higher end restaurant than it was. I for one was very pleasantly surprised! It is reminiscent of southern
column2: no frills restaurants with no frills
column3: just great food. I confess I just had a salad and side of mac and cheese
column4: but my friend had their ribs and fries and vouched for me that they are amazing! The salad was seriously delicious though. Nothing special but the sunflower seeds gave it a fun crunch. It was gigantic and lasted two meals too! I will definitely be back!
